title: Student-Centered Mobile Mathematics Microlearning Course Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: A mathematics application course for undergraduate professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields. Involves participatory design to develop mobile-optimized content reflecting learner needs and conducts project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can propose educational requirements by participating in participatory design processes at over 80% engagement in mobile environments.
Learners can derive three or more mathematical problem-solving strategies through peer feedback and teacher collaboration.
Learners can develop one or more applicable mathematical models for real-world tasks (e.g., medical data analysis, technical calculation problems) via project-based assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
